name: Debugger (Vilja, Daviscartes, UnknownXYZ)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 44.

You are a programmer in a dot-com company. Under high pressure, you need to follow a “996” work schedule. Your task is to debug routinely, consuming your life. The more bugs you catch, the more wage you will get. The Cafe and Gym are good place to go after a day's hard work, and they will help you handle your work easily in the future. Attention that don't let yourself get exhausted or let the boss find you goofing off, otherwise you will enter bad endings.

To play in the browser, use Chrome to get best experience.

It is open sourced here.

Team:
 - Graphics: @UnknownXYZ
 - Code: @Vilja
 - Design for anything else: @Daviscartes

Special attributions:

The BGMs are from www.soundimage.org by Eric Matyas.
